help.title: Game Help
help.pokerDescription: Learn poker hand rankings from highest to lowest:
help.auctionsDescription: Learn how different auction types work:

royalFlush.name: Royal Flush
royalFlush.description: The best possible hand! Five consecutive cards from 10 to Ace, all of the same suit.

straightFlush.name: Straight Flush
straightFlush.description: Five consecutive cards of the same suit. If two players have a straight flush, the one with the highest card wins.

fourOfAKind.name: Four of a Kind
fourOfAKind.description: Four cards of the same rank. The fifth card (kicker) can be anything.

fullHouse.name: Full House
fullHouse.description: Three cards of one rank and two cards of another rank. Also called a 'boat'.

flush.name: Flush
flush.description: Five cards of the same suit, but not in sequence. If two players have a flush, the highest card wins.

straight.name: Straight
straight.description: Five consecutive cards of different suits. Ace can be high (A-K-Q-J-10) or low (5-4-3-2-A).

threeOfAKind.name: Three of a Kind
threeOfAKind.description: Three cards of the same rank, plus two unrelated cards. Also called 'trips' or a 'set'.

twoPair.name: Two Pair
twoPair.description: Two cards of one rank, two cards of another rank, plus one unrelated card.

pair.name: One Pair
pair.description: Two cards of the same rank, plus three unrelated cards. The most common winning hand.

highCard.name: High Card
highCard.description: When you don't have any of the above hands, the highest card in your hand plays. Ace is the highest.

openAuction.name: Open Auction
openAuction.description: Players openly bid against each other. You can see the current highest bid. Enter your bid amount and submit when ready. The player with the highest bid wins the card.
openAuction.howTo:
1. Check the current bid
2. Enter a higher amount
3. Submit your bid
4. Highest bid wins!

silentAuction.name: Silent Auction
silentAuction.shortDesc: Hidden bids revealed at the end
silentAuction.description: All players submit their bids secretly. No one knows what others are bidding. All bids are revealed simultaneously, and the highest bidder wins the card.
silentAuction.howTo:
1. Enter your bid amount
2. Submit your secret bid
3. Wait for all players
4. Highest bid revealed wins!

dutchAuction.name: Dutch Auction
dutchAuction.shortDesc: Descending price, first to buy wins
dutchAuction.description: The price starts high and drops over time (shown on the main screen). The first player to hit 'Buy Now' wins the card at the current price. Act fast to get a good deal, but wait too long and someone else might buy it!
dutchAuction.howTo:
1. Watch the screen for price
2. Wait for your target price
3. Hit 'Buy Now' to claim
4. First buyer wins!
